DOC.brief_title: Early Luteal Progesterone Profile After hCG Triggering
DOC.detailed_description: The early luteal progesterone profile IVF differ significantly progesterone profile natural cycle , peak reach around time implantation . With non-invasive trial investigator wish explore early luteal phase profile progesterone hCG order optimize current luteal phase support policy IVF hopefully increase ongoing pregnancy rate . Stimulation , monitoring , oocyte pick-up perform accord standard procedure clinic . On day trigger 5.000 IU hCG blood sample drawn prior trigger subsequent analysis . Moreover , ovarian follicle side equal 11 mm register . Oocyte pick-up timing trigger bolus perform accord standard procedure unit . A total 10 blood sample draw trial - please see `` blood sampling '' . Blood sample collect follow day subsequent analysis LH , E2 , hCG progesterone . All embryos cryo-preserved transfer subsequent frozen/thaw embryo transfer cycle . Primary endpoint Serum concentration progesterone , LH , E2 , hCG early luteal phase . Secondary endpoint The correlation follicles ≥ 11 mm progesterone early luteal phase Data analyze use SPSS version 20 software . All test two tail , P < 0.05 consider statistically significant . Continuous variable present mean +/- SD test student 's t-test . Categorical data express number compare use Chi-square test .
DOC.criteria: IVF patient meet follow criterion : Freeze cycle hCG trigger Age 18 38 Body Mass Index ( BMI ) < 28kg/m2 Normal ovarian reserve , define AntiMullerian Hormone ( AMH ) > 1.25 ng/ml Antral Follicle Count ( AFC ) ≥ 6 measure within two month prior stimulation start Receiving Gonadotropin Releasing Hormone Antagonist cotreatment ovarian stimulation Agreement participate study , disclose medical event investigator . The subject must willing able comply protocol requirement duration study . Have give write informed consent understand subject may withdraw consent time without prejudice future medical care . Previous poor response ( ≤ 3 oocyte ) high dose FSH stimulation Hyperresponse define > 20 follicle ≥ 14 mm Chronical medical condition like Diabetes , Crohns disease , Thyroid disease , Hepatitis B Sexually Transmitted Diseases Simultaneous participation interventional clinical trial .
